text: Cleburne is a city and county seat of Johnson County, Texas, United States. At the 2020 U.S. Census, the population was 31,352. The city is named after Patrick Cleburne, a Confederate General. Lake Pat Cleburne, the reservoir that provides water to the city and surrounding area, is also named after Pat Cleburne. == References == Category:Cities in Texas Category:County seats in Texas
title: Cleburne, Texas
